description: CONSULTATION - Application for Reserved Matters Approval relating to access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale pursuant to Condition O.5 of the Stratford Waterfront Hybrid Planning Permission (ref: 18/00470/OUT as varied by ref: 20/00274/VAR).Â  The proposed development comprises the construction of four buildings which would include 700 residential units (Use Class C3) on the upper floors, with up to 1, 759 sqm (GEA) of supporting commercial, business and service uses (Use Class E (a-c)/drinking establishments/hot food takeaway (Sui Generis)) at ground/mezzanine level, together with associated blue badge parking and cycle parking, the provision of play space, public realm, landscaping, access, and associated works
site_name: Stratford Waterfront Outline Element, Carpenters Road, Stratford, London, Stratford,
